update outbox_event
event_id = #{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
event_type = #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
message = #{message,jdbcType=OTHER},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
retry_count = #{retryCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
next_retry_at = #{nextRetryAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update outbox_event set event_id = #{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, event_type = #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, message = #{message,jdbcType=OTHER}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, retry_count = #{retryCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, next_retry_at = #{nextRetryAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
UPDATE outbox_event SET `status` = #{status}, next_retry_at = #{retryAt}, retry_count = retry_count + 1, update_time = #{now} WHERE event_id = #{eventId} AND `status` = 1
